Name: Naill Ironfist
Trait: I always have a joke on hand when the mood gets too serious.
Ideal: Redemption. I will train all the harder to make up for the doubt I entertained when I was younger. (Any)
Bond: My weapon was a gift from a beloved trainer who died in an accident.
Flaw: I’m easily distracted by an attractive person, which could be the death of me in the trials.
Equipment: ['Shortsword', "Explorer's Pack", '10 Darts', 'Simple Puzzle Box', 'Scroll of Basic Teachings of the Five Gods', 'Gaming Set', 'Set of Common Clothes', '15 GP']

Name: Navaren Seemworth
Trait: I think non-humans are really interesting.
Ideal: Prepared. I think success depends on preparing as much as possible in advance. (Any)
Bond: I smuggled agricultural goods for non-human farmers. I try to help them when I can.
Flaw: I have difficulty trusting strangers. Anyone could be a spy for the authorities.
Equipment: ['Chain Mail', 'Shortsword', 'Shield', 'Light Crossbow', '20 Bolts', "Explorer's Pack", 'Forgery Kit', 'Set of Common Clothes', '5 GP']

Name: Adryan Peapod
Trait: Time is a precious resource that I must spend wisely.
Ideal: Determination. Threats to my home must be eliminated at all costs. (Any)
Bond: One of the Tears of the Virulence was a trusted friend, until the day they betrayed the city. They will pay harshly for their transgressions.
Flaw: I relentlessly despise the Maimed Virulence and his allies. I’d abandon other goals in order to strike out at them.
Equipment: ['Dagger', 'Component Pouch', "Scholar's Pack", 'Spellbook', '20 Caltrops', 'Small Trinket of a Previous Life', "Healer's Kit", 'Set of Dark Common Clothes with a Cloak and Hood', '5 GP']

Name: Teodus Forrest
Trait: Like roots growing through stone, I am relentless and determined in my action.
Ideal: Guild. My guild is all that really matters. (Any)
Bond: I found something in the sewer that must never come to light.
Flaw: I'm convinced that I'm better and stronger than members of other guilds, isolated as they are from the realities of life and death.
Equipment: ['Sling', "Dungeoneer's Pack", '10 Darts', "Poisoner's Kit", 'Pet Beetle or Spider', 'Set of Common Clothes', '10 GP']

Name: Riana Meluzan
Specialty: I secretly wish I could leave the Dimir and join this guild, but there is no escaping the Dimir.
Trait: I have no patience with people who get in my way.
Ideal: Control. I like pulling the strings. (Lawful)
Bond: I spend as much time as I can in the Ismeri Library because I'm certain an information hub operates behind its facade. I want its secrets!
Flaw: I'm pretty sure I've done something horrible that I can't remember because of the guild's mind magic.
Equipment: ['Club', "Dungeoneer's Pack", '10 Darts', 'Dimir Insignia', '3 Small Knives', 'Set of Dark Common Clothes']
